message.body: Martha youre my only hope, haha sorry its last minute but do you wanna work at 4 tonight for me? -conner
Oh man, I'm actually feeling a little under the weather but maybe I could push through. WhAt station?
Station b i think, so nothing too tough. I picked up those two sunday night shifts you posted by the office. Lemme know i guess
Yea, I'll pick it up tonight. Enjoy your weekend :)
Ahh martha you are awesome, thanks a bunch
